name: The Ugly Duckling (Kaleidoscopio)
description:
What if we could re-tell the most important stories in humanity in a more approachable way to the youngest generations?  

Through tech, we adapt the book content, trying to recreate the same experience from the original work allying visual + sound + text + reader’s agency.

We do NOT TRANSCRIPT THE ENTIRE BOOK. More than just text, we try to recreate the most important scenes to evoke the same feelings the author intended, using other elements as well.

Good stories never age!
